articles.author: Hanna Ziady, CNN Business
articles.title: Topshop owner Arcadia files for bankruptcy - CNN
articles.description: UK retailer Arcadia is seeking protection from creditors as it scrambles to save 13,000 jobs and brands such as Topshop after clothing sales collapsed during the pandemic.
